headings: Exploring the World, My Journey So Far !
paragraphs: Hi! I'm Vihaan Saxena, an 8th grader who loves to explore new things, especially when it comes to chess, robotics, math, and public speaking. I’ve been playing chess for a few years now, and it’s one of my biggest passions. I love the challenge of solving puzzles and coming up with strategies. My goal is to share my love for chess with others, so I’m planning to run chess classes and start a YouTube channel to teach new players the tips and tricks I’ve learned.

When I’m not playing chess, you’ll probably find me working on a robotics project. I enjoy building and programming robots—it's like solving a puzzle with cool technology! Math is another subject I really enjoy because it helps me think logically and solve problems in creative ways.

I also want to improve mypublic speakingskills. I believe that being able to speak clearly and confidently is super important, whether it’s teaching a class, giving a presentation, or just sharing ideas with others. I’m always looking for ways to get better at public speaking, so I can share my passion for chess and other things with even more people.

I love to travel and try new foods. Whether it’s exploring new places or tasting different cuisines, I’m always excited to experience something new. And when I’m at home, you’ll likely find me hanging out with my Golden Retriever, Ginger. She’s super playful and always ready for an adventure.

Right now, I’m focused on learning as much as I can, trying new things, and growing my skills—whether it's chess, robotics, math, public speaking, or just exploring new ideas. I’m excited to see where these interests take me!
